verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My song of thanksgiving I sing unto You
You've fulfilled your word to me
Your promises true

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I love You, love You, Jesus I love You
Jesus so faithful and true
Yes I love You, love You, Jesus I love You
Jesus I love You, I do

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Your Word is life to me
You've always been there
You've never forgotten
You've answered my prayer
